The times are hard for Real Madrid, but even more for Gareth Bale. Announced starting this summer, the attacker finally stayed in Spain, while he was predicting a transfer to China. Since then, the Welsh has had a good start to the season, but has not masked a certain weariness with regard to his situation at the club, by goals without celebration in the preparation phase, or off-field actions that made the Spanish press speak. .
At the beginning of November, Bale is dismissed by Zinedine Zidane with whom he would maintain an icy relationship, the French coach has never really relied on him 100%.
